comments:
Compare two images, expecting a particular RMS error.

im1 and im2 are filenames relative to the baseline_dir directory.

tol is the tolerance to pass to compare_images.

expect_rms is the expected RMS value, or None. If None, the test will succeed if compare_images succeeds. Otherwise, the test will succeed if compare_images fails and returns an RMS error almost equal to this value.
